verses.verse: <S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> has <S%H1129>built<s%> her <S%H1004>house,<s%> She has <S%H2672>hewn<s%> out her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5982>pillars;<s%>
She has <S%H2873>prepared<s%> her <S%H2874>food,<s%> she has <S%H4537>mixed<s%> her <S%H3196>wine;<s%> She has <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6186>set<s%> her <S%H7979>table;<s%>
She has <S%H7971>sent<s%> out her <S%H5291>maidens,<s%> she <S%H7121>calls<s%> From the <S%H1610>tops<s%> of the <S%H4791>heights<s%> of the city: <S%H7176><s%>
<S%H4310>"Whoever<s%> is <S%H6612>naive,<s%> let him <S%H5493>turn<s%> in <S%H2008>here!<s%>" To him <S%H2638>who<s%> <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3820>understanding<s%> she <S%H559>says,<s%>
<S%H1980>"Come,<s%> <S%H9237>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>food,<s%> And <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> I have <S%H4537>mixed.<s%>

He who <S%H3256>corrects<s%> a <S%H9238>scoffer<s%> <S%H3947>gets<s%> <S%H7036>dishonor<s%> for himself, And he who <S%H3198>reproves<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> [gets] <S%H9249>insults<s%> for himself.
Do not <S%H3198>reprove<s%> a <S%H9238>scoffer,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H8130>hate<s%> you, <S%H3198>Reprove<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man,<s%> and he will <S%H157>love<s%> you.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> [instruction] to a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man,<s%> and he will be <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2449>wiser,<s%> <S%H3045>Teach<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man,<s%> and he will <S%H3254>increase<s%> [his] <S%H3948>learning.<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> And the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> is <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
For by me your <S%H3117>days<s%> will be <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> And <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H9132>life<s%> will be <S%H3254>added<s%> to you.
<S%H518>If<s%> you are <S%H2449>wise,<s%> you are <S%H2449>wise<s%> for yourself, And if you <S%H9238>scoff,<s%> you <S%H905>alone<s%> will <S%H5375>bear<s%> it.
And she <S%H3427>sits<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of her <S%H1004>house,<s%> On a <S%H3678>seat<s%> by the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7176>city,<s%>
<S%H7121>Calling<s%> to those who <S%H5674>pass<s%> by, Who are <S%H3474>making<s%> their <S%H734>paths<s%> straight: <S%H3474><s%>
<S%H4310>"Whoever<s%> is <S%H6612>naive,<s%> let him <S%H5493>turn<s%> in <S%H2008>here,<s%>" And to him <S%H2638>who<s%> <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3820>understanding<s%> she <S%H559>says,<s%>
But he does not <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H7496>dead<s%> are <S%H8033>there,<s%> [That] her <S%H7121>guests<s%> are in the <S%H6011>depths<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
